titleStmt.title: A nevv booke of new conceits with a number of nouelties annexed threreunto. Whereof some be profitable, some necessary, some strange, none hurtful, and all delectable. By Thomas Iohnson.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Thomas, d. 1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[liz] A[llde] for Edward Wright and Cuthbert Wright,
